item.title: Trump, pushing for Ciattarelli, says NJ 'ready to pop out of blue horror show'
item.description: President Donald Trump implored voters in New Jersey’s primary for governor to vote for Republican Jack Ciattarelli when early in-person voting begins...

item.title: Man accused of framing other with Trump threat letters for deportation
item.description: A Wisconsin man is facing charges accusing him of forging letters threatening President Donald Trump’s life in an effort to get another man deported

item.title: North Dakota's historic sites will finally have toilets that flush
item.description: Visitors to historic sites in North Dakota will soon have flush toilets available

item.title: Stabbing attack at Oregon homeless shelter injures a dozen people
item.description: Police say a dozen people were injured in a stabbing attack at an Oregon homeless shelter and a suspect was arrested

item.title: Trump appears to undercut US proposal to Iran, declaring he won't allow any uranium enrichment
item.description: President Donald Trump has appeared to undercut a proposal that was offered by his special envoy to Iran
